EmailTemplate.name: 18-Bus @ Cloud Spd-Peering Engineering-Email-NFD20Emailers-T003LV.Email - Remind
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder! Nokia peering livestream at NFD20
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Reminder! Peering livestream at NFD20 Take control of your peering edge Join our livestream at Networking Field Day 20 February 13, 2019 at 4-6 pm PST Join Nokia technical experts at Networking Field Day 20 <[[https://techfieldday.com/event/nfd20/]]> to learn how our advanced network analytics, automated peering and DDoS mitigation address peering issues such as network latency, performance and security. Nokia at Networking Field Day 20 With a demo of our express peering solution, supported by our Network Services Platform (NSP), Deepfield analytics and IP routing solutions, we will show how Nokia can help you take control of your internet peering edge <[[http://pf.content.nokia.com/nfd20/?lb_email={{lead.Email Address}}&did=d000000001aa&utm_campaign=peering_engineering&utm_source=email-list-marketo_nfd20&utm_medium=email&utm_content=reminder]]>. Agenda 4:00 pm
Welcome and introduction to Nokia
Houman Modarres, Head of Marketing, IP Routing
4:10 pm
Internet peering Trends, challenges and evolution, and how insight-driven automation can help evolve and enhance peering engineering and peering security
Craig Labovitz, General Manager, Deepfield Jeffery Sugimoto, IP Consulting Engineering
4:30 pm
Network analytics and multi-dimensional insights Overview of Nokia Deepfield solution, including cloud genome and cloud intelligence demo
Andrew Henkart, Senior Consulting Engineer, Deepfield
5:00 pm
Automated peering engineering Presentation and demo of Nokia espress peering covering egress peering engineering (EPE), inbound route optimization and latency-based traffic optimization
Hamid Ould-Brahim, Senior Product Line Manager Reda Laichi, IP Principal Consulting Engineer
5:30 pm
Network-assisted DDoS Mitigation Introduction to Deepfield Defender and a review of volumetric DDoS mitigation based on the Nokia FP4 router silicon and Deepfield solution.
Andrew Henkart, Senior Consulting Engineer, Deepfield Philippe Bergeon, IP Product Manager
6:00 pm
Closing remarks Take control of your peering edge
Jeffery Sugimoto, IP Consulting Engineering {{my.Save the date}} © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
